inclusion.criterion: at least one negative TRUS-guided prostate biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least one suspected region detected at multiparametric MR imaging
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: contraindication against MR imaging or uncooperative patients
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man with a history of acute urinary retention and large prostate. He has normal blood chemistry and negative urinalysis results.
